title: Trump says Hillary Clinton should try to 'steal' Democrat nomination from Warren
text:
Donald Trump attempted to stir up trouble in the Democratic primary on Tuesday, telling Hillary Clinton she should make a third attempt at the presidency —and earned a prompt response: 'Don't tempt me.'

Trump said that she should try to 'steal' the nomination from Elizabeth Warren in a tweet in which he said the only 'condition' of his offer is that Clinton revisit her email scandal.

'I think that Crooked Hillary Clinton should enter the race to try and steal it away from Uber Left Elizabeth Warren. Only one condition. The Crooked one must explain all of her high crimes and misdemeanors including how & why she deleted 33,000 Emails AFTER getting “C” Subpoena!' he said in an apparent reference to former FBI director James Comey.

Donald Trump said Hillary Clinton should try to 'steal' the nomination from Elizabeth Warren. Trump received a reply from Clinton, but not the one he was after

Hillary Clinton is a reoccurring figure in Trump's tweets and in his campaign speeches. He continues to claim she 'acid-washed' emails Clinton says were personal

Trump received a reply from Clinton, but not the one he was after. She told him, 'Don’t tempt me. Do your job.'

Clinton lost out on the Democratic nomination twice, in 2008 and 2016, serving as secretary of state in the years in between.

She is a reoccurring figure in Trump's tweets and in his campaign speeches.

He continues to claim she 'acid-washed' emails Clinton says were personal.

She kept sensitive government emails and private messages that did not pertain to her work at the State Department on the same home-operated server that the government could not access.

She received a slap on the wrist for running afoul of federal record-keeping laws but Comey declined to prosecute her for alleged criminal conduct.

Clinton says she and her lawyers held back and discarded 31,830 emails they deemed private and unrelated to her work product.

The FBI determined the emails were destroyed roughly three weeks after Clinton received a congressional subpoena ordering her to to turn over all pertinent documents.

Trump's erroneous claim that she acid-washed the emails comes from a company's admission it used BleachBit on Clinton's emails — a system cleanser that does not use chemicals.

The gal pals are seen here at a rally in Cincinnati, Ohio, in June of 2016, when Clinton was about to become the Democrat's official candidate for president

Since coming under scrutiny for a call with Ukraine's president in which Trump is accused of engaging in a quid pro quo, his claim that Clinton violated the law and got away with it has reemerged.

Trump has also floated theories his own government has said are conspiracies that Ukraine, and not Russia, hacked the Democratic National Committee's servers in 2016.

The chairman of the Senate Homeland Security Committee, a Republican, also claimed without evidence on Sunday that Clinton may have asked Ukraine to dig up dirt on Joe Biden to blackmail him into sitting out the last presidential election.

Biden is in a statistical dead heat with Warren in the 2020 Democratic presidential primary.

Trump has mercilessly mocked the Massachusetts senator for claiming she's a Native American before releasing a DNA test showing she's only 1/1,024th

He claims that Biden abused his office as vice president to get a Ukrainian prosecutor fired to keep the man from investigating his son.

Democrats in the lower chamber have opened an impeachment inquiry into Trump over his attempts to get the Ukrainian government to investigate his potential general election opponent.
description: Donald Trump attempted to stir up trouble in the Democratic primary on Tuesday, telling Hillary Clinton she should make a third attempt at the presidency.
authors: Senior White House Correspondent For Dailymail.Com
